Self.Wiki: Determines the homing cancellation behavior for a blade melee attack.

cancelAngDegR.Wiki: Interrupt above the specified right angle. In degrees.

cancelAngDegL.Wiki: Interrupt above the specified left angle. In degrees.

cancelAngDegU.Wiki: Interrupt above the specified upward angle. In degrees.

cancelAngDegD.Wiki: Interrupt above the specified downward angle. In degrees.

cancelDist.Wiki: Interrupted within this distance. -1 = infinity = no interruption at distance. In metres.

nolockMinTimeSec.Wiki: Minimum time without no lock. In seconds.

outTargetDist.Wiki: When the target is outside this distance, the behavior is non-locking. -1 always behaves when locked
